text: O vos believe non kill any game pilgrimage Anyone kills any game on purpose his fine est ut numerus de livestock animals est equivalent to game animals he killed judgment set 2 equitable people vos. They factus sure ut offerings reach Ka bah. Alias he expiate feeding poor people equivalent fast atone his offense DEUS pardoned offenses Si anyone returns to such offense DEUS testimentum avenge it DEUS est Almighty Avenger
